convoluter module¶

Convolutionally applies a saved Tensorflow model to a larger image, displaying the result as a heatmap overlay.

class convoluter.Convoluter[source]¶

Bases: object

batch(n=1)[source]¶

Organizes image tiles into workable batches for transfer to the GPU.

concat_output()[source]¶

Converts a 2D collection of 2D patches into a single large 2D array

display(logits, size, stride)[source]¶

Displays logits calculated using scan_image as a heatmap overlay.

scan_image()[source]¶

Opens a whole-slide image, sections it into tiles, loads a saved Tensorflow model, and applies the model to each of the image tiles. The output - a 3D array of logits that correspond to model predictions at each location on the whole-slide iamge, is then restructured into an array that can be displayed as a heatmap overlay.

stride_divisor = 4¶
